article.title: QinetiQ North America Wins Contract for C4ISR Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Pacific has awarded QinetiQ North America's Systems Engineering Group a contract to support the Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (C4ISR) Programs Office Philadelphia, Product Distribution Center. The five-year contract has a ceiling value of $7.2 million.
